name: Compensation
text: §435E-33  Compensation.  No person shall receive, or be entitled to receive any payment, bonus, salary, income, compensation, or other benefit whatsoever, either from the reserve trust fund or the income therefrom or from any other funds of the interindemnity arrangement or the members thereof based on the number of participating members, or the amount of the reserve trust fund or other funds of the interindemnity arrangement. [L 1977, c 182, pt of §1]
